function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adaptive environmental governance","Impact":"Inefficient response to challenges, limited innovation, and inflexible rules","Mitigation":"Developing flexible governance structures, promoting learning processes, and encouraging innovation","Technologies":"Adaptive management software, data analytics for decision-making, and communication platforms","People":"Managers of urban green spaces in Latin America","Owner":"Government agencies and urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Limited documentation of COVID-19 mobility protocols in urban green spaces","Impact":"Inability to assess the effectiveness of protocols, lack of evidence-based decision-making, and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough documentation, sharing best practices, and implementing evidence-based protocols","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, GIS mapping for spatial analysis, and communication technologies","People":"Managers of urban green spaces in Latin America","Owner":"local public health agencies and urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Potential lethality of COVID-19 in Latin America","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion, increased burden on healthcare systems, and higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, increasing access to healthcare, and promoting vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, contact tracing apps, and healthcare data analysis tools","People":"Residents of Latin American cities","Owner":"Public health agencies and government authorities"}]}
